review: Constant freezing and skipping issues.  Only device in the whole house that I have this problem with.  I've had my internet provider out to the house to check everything and all is good.  All of our other devices (Wii, XBOX, tablets, etc) work fine with streaming movies, etc.  But not the Fire Stick.  Total waste of money.  I'm going with the Apple TV.
